Class ElectoralCollegeController

java.lang.Object
ElectoralCollegeController
public class ElectoralCollegeController extends Object
Controller for the Electorial College application

A controller that interacts with a FXML file to control certain areas and how they interact with one another. Contains several like updating fields and selection buttons/bars to simulate an electorial college vote.

Author:
augward

  • Constructor Details

    • ElectoralCollegeController

      public ElectoralCollegeController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializer of the controller class. Sets up all the states and their weights Then breaks them apart and builds lists, records, and choices maps.

    • updateListChoice

      private void updateListChoice()
      Toggles the visible radio button based off the selected state. Keeps the memory of the choice visible instead of just cataloged.

    • updateRadio

      private void updateRadio()
      Happens when a button is selected for the state's choice. Inserts it into the map and runs checks to update fields like winner

    • updateVotes

      private void updateVotes()
      Updates the votes and their following fields. Keeping a live tracker and provide useful metrics for users.

    • updateRecord

      private void updateRecord(String state, String choice)
      Updates the record keeper in the right by appending the most recent choice to the top of the list, shows progress
      Parameters:
      state - the state that got changed
      choice - the updated choice of the state

    • checkWinner

      private void checkWinner()
      Checks if either group has reach 270 votes. Should only be one winner, but logic protects in case not
